fields.summary: KitchenSink: Platform > XHR > File download, repeatedly pressing "Large File Download" results in multiple downloads starting and eventual crash

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5. To reproduce
1. Install KS 3.3.1 on iOS device
2. Navigate to KS> Platform> XHR> File download
3. Press "Large File Download"
h5. Actual result
The progress bar is showing the process, it can be aborted, however continuing  downloading the file  results in the Error: The request timed out.
fields.summary: KitchenSink: Platform - Intermittent XHR large file download fails with timed out error
fields.environment:
Mac osx 10.9.5 Mavericks
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.4.0.201409231834

comments.body: The link being used is http://titanium-studio.s3.amazonaws.com/latest/Titanium_Studio.exe', the link is *not* dead and it works on an iOS7 and on iOS8 non iPhone 6 devices. Appears to be intermittent
